languages.text: {n}Соломон резко оборачивается к вам — на нем нет респиратора, а из-под формы выглядывают свежие бинты. Бывший проктор встречает вас ревом, полным ярости:{/n} "Кто открыл ваши камеры? Кто?! Отвечайте, или ваша смерть будет..."

{n}Solomorne turns sharply toward you. He is not wearing a rebreather, and fresh bandages peek out from under his uniform. The former Proctor roars, consumed with rage:{/n} "Who opened your cells? WHO DID IT? Speak, or your deaths will be—"
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон резко оборачивается к вам — на нем нет респиратора, а из-под формы выглядывают свежие бинты. Бывший проктор встречает вас ревом, полным ярости:{/n} "Кто открыл ваши камеры? Кто?! Отвечайте, или ваша смерть будет..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne sharply turns toward you. He is not wearing a rebreather, and fresh bandages peek out from under his uniform. :{/n} "Who opened your cells? Who?! Speak, or your deaths will be..."

{n}Solomorne turns sharply toward you. He is not wearing a rebreather, and fresh bandages peek out from under his uniform. The former Proctor roars, consumed with rage:{/n} "Who opened your cells? WHO DID IT? Speak, or your deaths will be—"

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは急にあなたに向き直った。彼はガスマスクを着けていなかった。新しい包帯が制服の下から覗いている。元代理人は怒りに燃え、咆哮した。{/n}「誰がお前たちの監房を開けた？誰がやった？言え、さもなくばお前たちの死は―」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns sharply toward you. He is not wearing a rebreather, and fresh bandages peek out from under his uniform. The former Proctor roars, consumed with rage:{/n} "Who opened your cells? WHO DID IT? Speak, or your deaths will be—"

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは急にあなたに向き直った。彼はガスマスクを着けていなかった。新しい包帯が制服の下から覗いている。元代理人は怒りに燃え、咆哮した。{/n}「誰がお前たちの監房を開けた？誰がやった？言え、さもなくばお前たちの死は―」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne wirbelt zu dir herum. Er trägt kein Atemschutzgerät, und unter seiner Uniform sich frische Bandagen zu erkennen. Der frühere Proktor ist voller Zorn und brüllt.{/n} "Wer hat Eure Zellen geöffnet? WER? Sprecht, oder Euer Tod wird ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns sharply toward you. He is not wearing a rebreather, and fresh bandages peek out from under his uniform. The former Proctor roars, consumed with rage:{/n} "Who opened your cells? WHO DID IT? Speak, or your deaths will be—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne wirbelt zu dir herum. Er trägt kein Atemschutzgerät, und unter seiner Uniform sich frische Bandagen zu erkennen. Der frühere Proktor ist voller Zorn und brüllt.{/n} "Wer hat Eure Zellen geöffnet? WER? Sprecht, oder Euer Tod wird ..."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne tourne brusquement vers vous. Il ne porte pas de respirateur, et des bandages frais dépassent de son uniforme. Le proctor déchu se met à rugir, furieux :{/n} « Qui a ouvert vos cellules ? QUI ? Parlez, ou je vous promets une mort... »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns sharply toward you. He is not wearing a rebreather, and fresh bandages peek out from under his uniform. The former Proctor roars, consumed with rage:{/n} "Who opened your cells? WHO DID IT? Speak, or your deaths will be—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne tourne brusquement vers vous. Il ne porte pas de respirateur, et des bandages frais dépassent de son uniforme. Le proctor déchu se met à rugir, furieux :{/n} « Qui a ouvert vos cellules ? QUI ? Parlez, ou je vous promets une mort... »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se gira bruscamente hacia ti. No lleva respirador, y unos vendajes recientes asoman por debajo de su uniforme. El antiguo procurador ruge, consumido por la ira:{/n} «¿Quién ha abierto vuestras celdas? ¿QUIÉN HA SIDO? Hablad, o moriréis como...».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns sharply toward you. He is not wearing a rebreather, and fresh bandages peek out from under his uniform. The former Proctor roars, consumed with rage:{/n} "Who opened your cells? WHO DID IT? Speak, or your deaths will be—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se gira bruscamente hacia ti. No lleva respirador, y unos vendajes recientes asoman por debajo de su uniforme. El antiguo procurador ruge, consumido por la ira:{/n} «¿Quién ha abierto vuestras celdas? ¿QUIÉN HA SIDO? Hablad, o moriréis como...».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙猛地转向了你。此刻，他没有戴呼吸器，制服下面露出了不久前才刚刚打好的绷带。这位前任监察官怒吼起来，声音中充斥着无法遏制的怒火。{/n}“是谁打开了你的牢门？是谁干的？赶紧说，否则就等着死刑——”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns sharply toward you. He is not wearing a rebreather, and fresh bandages peek out from under his uniform. The former Proctor roars, consumed with rage:{/n} "Who opened your cells? WHO DID IT? Speak, or your deaths will be—"

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙猛地转向了你。此刻，他没有戴呼吸器，制服下面露出了不久前才刚刚打好的绷带。这位前任监察官怒吼起来，声音中充斥着无法遏制的怒火。{/n}“是谁打开了你的牢门？是谁干的？赶紧说，否则就等着死刑——”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, keskin bir şekilde sana dönüyor. Solunum cihazı kullanmıyor, üniformasının altından da yeni sarılmış sargılar görünüyor. Eski Üsteğmen öfke içinde kükrüyor.{/n} "Hücrelerini kim açtı? KİM YAPTI BUNU? Konuş yoksa ölümleriniz..."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns sharply toward you. He is not wearing a rebreather, and fresh bandages peek out from under his uniform. The former Proctor roars, consumed with rage:{/n} "Who opened your cells? WHO DID IT? Speak, or your deaths will be—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne keskin bir şekilde sana döner. Bir solunum cihazı kullanmıyor, üniformasının altından da yeni sarılmış sargılar görünmektedir. Eski Üsteğmen öfke içinde kükreyerek: {/n} "Hücrelerini kim açtı? KİM YAPTI BUNU? Konuş yoksa ölümleriniz..."
